options.name: Downscroll
options.description: Makes your notes scroll downwards instead of upwards.

options.name: Centered Notes
options.description: Makes your notes centered and hides the opponent's notes.

options.name: Ghost Tapping
options.description: Allows you to hit notes that don't exist.

options.name: Botplay
options.description: Makes the game play itself for you.

options.name: Auto Pause
options.description: Choose whether or not the game pauses while not focused on the window.

options.name: Preload Assets
options.description: Preloads assets like images, music, and sounds when the game starts to load into songs faster. (Enabling this option uses more memory, A restart is needed for this to take effect)

options.name: Note Offset
options.description: Change how early or late your notes spawn. (Negative = Earlier, Positive = Later)

options.name: Scroll Speed
options.description: Change how fast the notes go on screen. (In seconds)

options.name: Lane Underlay
options.description: Shows a black rectangle behind your notes with an alpha from 0 to 1. 0 = Invisible, 1 = Completely Visible, Anything in-between = Slightly/Half Visible

options.name: Show FPS
options.description: Display the current Frames Per Second of the game.

options.name: Show Memory
options.description: Display the current memory usage of the game.

options.name: Show Version
options.description: Display the current version of the engine.

options.name: Simplify Info
options.description: Simplifies the FPS, Memory and Version display.

options.name: Ultra Performance
options.description: Removes the background and characters from gameplay and leaves you with just the UI. Gives much better performance on worse pcs.

options.name: Photosensitive Mode
options.description: Disables photosensitive content such as flashing lights. (May not work on some mods!)

options.name: Antialiasing
options.description: Gives the game extra performance at the cost of worse looking graphics.

options.name: Opaque Strums
options.description: Makes the strums opaque instead of transparent.

options.name: Opaque Sustains
options.description: Makes sustains opaque instead of transparent.

options.name: Note Splashes
options.description: Makes a firework effect appear when you hit a "SiCK!!" note.

options.name: Arrow Skin
options.description: Change the skin your arrows use.

options.name: Developer Mode
options.description: Allows you to access the toolbox for making mods. (Also enables pressing F5 to reload state if the state allows for it)

options.name: Max Logs
options.description: Sets the maximum of logs in the logs menu. (Increasing this may have an impact on your CPU)

options.name: 1k Keybinds
options.description: Change your singular keybind for 1k.

options.name: 2k Keybinds
options.description: Change your keybinds for 2k.

options.name: 3k Keybinds
options.description: Change your keybinds for 3k.

options.name: 4k Keybinds
options.description: Change your keybinds for 4k.

options.name: 5k Keybinds
options.description: Change your keybinds for 5k.

options.name: 6k Keybinds
options.description: Change your keybinds for 6k.

options.name: 7k Keybinds
options.description: Change your keybinds for 7k.

options.name: 8k Keybinds
options.description: Change your keybinds for 8k.

options.name: 9k Keybinds
options.description: Change your keybinds for 9k.
